enhanced_description: HappyPlus Consulting, founded by positive psychologists, happiness experts, and researchers, is dedicated to boosting global happiness through science-backed programs and positive interventions. The solution aims to enhance employee productivity, efficiency, and overall well-being, helping individuals lead thriving, fulfilling lives. It features an intelligent listening platform to facilitate two-way communication between leaders and employees, ensuring voices are heard and acted upon. HappyPlus also provides ongoing support through its Happiness App and Happbit app, guiding individuals on their path to greater well-being, and offers programs for strengths-based personal and professional development.
